name: Albrecht Jung GmbH & Co.KG
description:
A. JUNG (founded in 1912) stands for progress and success in the field of electrical installation. With 625 employees, 49 representations and five subsidiaries worldwide JUNG is one of the leading manufacturers of electrical wiring accessories, such as high quality switches, dimmers and lighting control systems in various design ranges.
In addition, JUNG is one of the major manufacturers for standardised building management system KNX.
